title: Time Management
verses: Ephesians 5:15–16 (WEB) — “Redeem the time, because the days are evil.”
Colossians 4:5 (WEB) — “Walk in wisdom… redeeming the time.”
Proverbs 21:5 (WEB) — “The plans of the diligent surely lead to profit.”
Psalm 90:12 (WEB) — “Teach us to count our days.”
body: Time is a trust from God. Number your days, align them with love, and let margin protect what matters most.
prayer: Eternal Lord, help me steward my hours with wisdom. Set my priorities by Your kingdom and keep me faithful today. Amen.
